#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t, n, k;

	cin >> t;
	while (t--){
		char str[20020];
		cin>>n>>k;
		cin>>str;
		int s = 0, e = 1, cnt = 0,sol=0;
		while (e <= n){
			while (str[e] == str[s] && e < n) e++;
			cnt += (e - s)/k + ((e-s)%k==0?0:1);
			if(e-s>=k)
				sol=1;
			s = e;
			e++;
			
		}
		if(!sol)	cout<<"-1"<<endl;
		else		cout<<cnt<<endl;
	}
}
